ARABIC: خُلِقَ ٱلْإِنسَٰنُ مِنْ عَجَلٍ سَأُو۟رِيكُمْ ءَايَٰتِى فَلَا تَسْتَعْجِلُونِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Man was created hasty. I will show you My Signs so do not try to hasten Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Man is made of inordinate haste. We will show you Our signs, then you will not desire to hasten (the punishment).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Man is hasty by nature. I shall certainly show you My Signs. Do not ask Me to be hasty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The human being is created hasty. Tell them, "Do not be hasty, for God will soon show you the evidence of His existence".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Man has been created hasty; very soon I shall show you My signs, do not be impatient.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Man is created of haste. I will show you My Ayat. So ask Me not to hasten (them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Man is created of haste; now will I show to you My signs, therefore do not ask Me to hasten (them) on.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Man was created of haste. Assuredly I shall show you My signs; so demand not that I make haste.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Man is made of haste. I shall show you My portents, but ask Me not to hasten.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Man is a creature of haste. Soon I will show you My signs, but do not ask Me to hasten them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Man was created of hast, surely I shall show you MY signs, so ask Me not to hasten.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Man is a creature of haste. Soon I will show you My signs. So do not ask Me to hasten.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Man is a creature of haste: soon (enough) will I show you My Signs; then ye will not ask Me to hasten them!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Man is created of haste, I will show you My Ayat (torments, proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.). So ask Me not to hasten (them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The human was created of haste. Indeed, I will show you My signs; so do not ask Me to hasten them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The human being was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not seek to rush Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:37] The following was revealed regarding their demand that chastisement be hastened: Man was created of   haste, that is to say, because he is so hasty in his affairs, it is as if he had been created out of it. Assuredly I shall show you My signs, My promises of chastisement, so do not demand that I hasten, in [sending] it. And so He [God] made them suffer death at [the battle of] Badr.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Man) i.e. Adam (is made of haste) he is hasty; it is also said that this means: man, al-Nadr Ibn al-Harth, was created hasty, for he wanted chastisement to be hastened for him. (I shall show you My portents) I shall show you the signs of My divine Oneness in the horizons; it is also said that this means: I will show the signs of My punishment of you through the sword on the Day of Badr, (but ask Me not to hasten) My chastisement before its appointed time.
